c1.name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
c1.effect: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by **Dominus Lapidis** that may exist simultaneously to 2.

c2.name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
c2.effect: **Planet Befall** grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

c3.name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Dominus Lapidis** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
c4.effect: Increases **Planet Befall**'s AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall's Petrification effect by 2s.

c5.name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Planet Befall** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
c6.effect:
When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.
A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.
